titles.title: Medicare Provider Payment Equity Act of 1993
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the reduced medicare payment provision for new providers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S440)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Medicare Provider Payment Equity Act of 1993 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to repeal provisions providing reduced Medicare reimbursements for new physicians and other health care providers.
